original: lung 'bogs @244b par mi bya /
analyzed: lung 'bogs @244b par mi bya /
translated: One should not recite the scriptures.

original: lung nod par mi bya /
analyzed: lung nod par mi bya /
translated: One should not receive the scriptures.

original: dran par mi bya /
analyzed: dran par mi bya /
translated: One should not remember.

original: sar dri bar mi bya /
analyzed: sar dri bar mi bya /
translated: One should not ask questions.

original: rnal 'byor dang / yid la byed par mi bya /
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang / yid la byed par mi bya /
translated: One should not practice yoga.

original: gtam la zhugs shing mi bya /
analyzed: gtam la zhugs shing mi bya /
translated: One should not engage in conversation.

original: lhung bzed kyi las mi bya /
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi las mi bya /
translated: One should not do anything with the alms bowl.

original: so shing bca' bar mi bya /
analyzed: so shing bca' bar mi bya /
translated: One should not chew tooth wood.

original: lag pa dang / rkang pa bkru bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa dang / rkang pa bkru bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not wash the hands and feet.

original: cho ga thams cad kyang bshang sa'i phyogs kyi nye 'khor du mi bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga thams cad kyang bshang sa'i phyogs kyi nye 'khor du mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do any ritual near the toilet.

original: bshang sa'i gnas su nges par bya ba rnams ni ma gtogs te /
analyzed: bshang sa'i gnas su nges par bya ba rnams ni ma gtogs te /
translated: Except for the activities that are certain to be done in the toilet.

original: 'di ni bshang sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bshang sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity near the toilet.

original: gci ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gci ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of defecating?

original: dge slong gis gar bab bab tu gci bar mi bya /🔽rtsig pa'i drung du gcig bar mi bya ;
analyzed: dge slong gis gar bab bab tu gci bar mi bya / rtsig pa'i drung du gcig bar mi bya ;
translated: A monk should not defecate anywhere.🔽One should not defecate near a wall.

original: shing ljon pa'i drung du gci bar mi bya /
analyzed: shing ljon pa'i drung du gci bar mi bya /
translated: One should not defecate near a tree.

original: shes bzhin du bya /
analyzed: shes bzhin du bya /
translated: One should do it mindfully.

original: phyogs gcig tu gci bar bya /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu gci bar bya /
translated: One should defecate in one place.

original: gal te gci ba snyi ba zhig tu gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gci ba snyi ba zhig tu gyur na /
translated: If the feces are loose,

original: gcin snod kyi gyo mo bcad par bya /
analyzed: gcin snod kyi gyo mo bcad par bya /
translated: The pot for urine should be cut.

original: yang na khung bu brko bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang na khung bu brko bar bya ste /
translated: Or a hole should be dug.

original: 'di ni gci ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gci ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for urine.

original: gci sa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gci sa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for the toilet?

original: dge slong gis gci sar 'jug par 'dod na /
analyzed: dge slong gis gci sar 'jug par 'dod na /
translated: If a monk wishes to enter the toilet,

original: de snga nas 'jug pas tshor bar bya ba'i phyir se gol brdab par bya ba nas /
analyzed: de snga nas 'jug pas tshor bar bya ba'i phyir se gol brdab par bya ba nas /
translated: he should snap his fingers beforehand to check for any living beings inside.

original: snga ma bzhin te /🔽mi bro ba la mi ba tsir /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin te / mi bro ba la mi ba tsir /
translated: The rest is the same as before.🔽If there is no smell, he should not enter.

original: bro ba la mi dgag pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: bro ba la mi dgag pa'i bar du ste /
translated: If there is a smell, he should not block the entrance.

original: 'di ni gci sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gci sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for the toilet.

original: gci sa'i khung gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gci sa'i khung gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for the toilet hole?

original: dge slong gis gci sa'i khung bu'i khar bags kyis shes bzhin du gci bar bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis gci sa'i khung bu'i khar bags kyis shes bzhin du gci bar bya /
translated: A monk should urinate in the toilet hole with mindfulness and care.

original: gci sa'i khar mi 'dor ba dang mi 'brel par bya ste /
analyzed: gci sa'i khar mi 'dor ba dang mi 'brel par bya ste /
translated: He should not throw anything into the toilet hole or block it.

original: de ni gci sa'i khung gi bya ba zhes bya'o //🔽gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de ni gci sa'i khung gi bya ba zhes bya'o // gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: This is called the procedure for the toilet hole.🔽What is the procedure for the senior monk in the toilet?

original: gci sar dge slong gnas brtan gyis /
analyzed: gci sar dge slong gnas brtan gyis /
translated: A senior monk in the toilet

original: gci sar dge slong gsar bu gci zhig 'dug pa bslang bar mi bya'o //🔽ci sar 'dug pa las bslang bar mi bya ba ni /
analyzed: gci sar dge slong gsar bu gci zhig 'dug pa bslang bar mi bya'o // ci sar 'dug pa las bslang bar mi bya ba ni /
translated: A newly ordained monk should not be made to get up from the place where he is defecating.🔽He should not be made to get up from the place where he is urinating.

original: tha na gci sar 'dug pa dang zhugs pa bzlog par mi bya ste /
analyzed: tha na gci sar 'dug pa dang zhugs pa bzlog par mi bya ste /
translated: He should not be made to get up from the place where he is sitting.

original: 'di ni gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty of the place for defecating.

original: gci sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gci sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of the vicinity of the place for defecating?

original: dge slong gci sa'i nye 'khor du 'greng par mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: dge slong gci sa'i nye 'khor du 'greng par mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: A monk should not stand in the vicinity of the place for defecating.

original: gci sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: gci sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: He should not stand in the vicinity of the place for urinating.

original: 'di gci ba'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di gci ba'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty of the vicinity of the place for defecating.

original: bkru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bkru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of the place for washing?

original: dge slong gis ma bkrus kyi bar du /
analyzed: dge slong gis ma bkrus kyi bar du /
translated: A monk should not go to the teacher,

original: ston pa la ba ltar @245a * //🔽'gro bar mi bya /🔽mchog rten la ma yin /🔽slob dpon dang / mkhan po la ma yin /
analyzed: ston pa la ba ltar @245a * // 'gro bar mi bya / mchog rten la ma yin / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la ma yin /
translated: to the preceptor,🔽to the master,🔽to the abbot,

original: bla ma la ma yin /
analyzed: bla ma la ma yin /
translated: to the guru,

original: bla ma'i gnas lta bu la ma yin /
analyzed: bla ma'i gnas lta bu la ma yin /
translated: to one who is like a guru,

original: phyag mi bya /
analyzed: phyag mi bya /
translated: without washing.

original: kha ton mi bya /
analyzed: kha ton mi bya /
translated: One should not recite.

original: lung 'bogs par mi bya /
analyzed: lung 'bogs par mi bya /
translated: One should not give oral transmissions.

original: slad mar mi bya /
analyzed: slad mar mi bya /
translated: One should not do it later.

original: dran par mi bya /
analyzed: dran par mi bya /
translated: One should not remember it.

original: kun dri bar mi bya /
analyzed: kun dri bar mi bya /
translated: One should not ask about it.

original: grong du 'jug par mi bya /🔽zan la 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: grong du 'jug par mi bya / zan la 'dug par mi bya /
translated: One should not enter a village.🔽One should not sit down to eat.

original: skyo ma la 'dug par mi bya /🔽thug pa la 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: skyo ma la 'dug par mi bya / thug pa la 'dug par mi bya /
translated: One should not sit down to drink.🔽One should not sit down to eat porridge.

original: btung ba la 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: btung ba la 'dug par mi bya /
translated: One should not sit down to drink.

original: chos bshad pa la 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: chos bshad pa la 'dug par mi bya /
translated: One should not sit down to explain the Dharma.

original: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal stan la 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal stan la 'dug par mi bya /
translated: One should not sit down on the bedding of the Saṅgha in the four directions.🔽If one becomes ill, there is no offense.

original: na bar gyur na ni nyes pa med de yang na mi'i lha chu yin par gyur tam gal te chu ma 'byor tam /
analyzed: na bar gyur na ni nyes pa med de yang na mi'i lha chu yin par gyur tam gal te chu ma 'byor tam /
translated: If one is a god or a human, or if one does not have water,

original: bkrur mi rung ba'i sman btab pa ni ma gtogs te /
analyzed: bkrur mi rung ba'i sman btab pa ni ma gtogs te /
translated: or if one has applied an unsuitable medicine,

original: de ni bkru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bkru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called the procedure for washing.

original: bkru ba'i gnas kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bkru ba'i gnas kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for the place of washing?

original: bkru ba'i gnas su 'gro ba'i dge slong gis se gol gtogs pa nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: bkru ba'i gnas su 'gro ba'i dge slong gis se gol gtogs pa nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: A monk who goes to the place of washing should snap his fingers, as before, up to:

original: bkru ba'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: bkru ba'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: One should not sit down in the place of washing.

original: de ni bkru ba'i gnas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bkru ba'i gnas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for the washing place.

original: bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa gzhag pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa gzhag pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the procedure for placing the feet at the washing place?

original: khrus byed par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis bkru ba'i tshe /
analyzed: khrus byed par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis bkru ba'i tshe /
translated: When a monk who wishes to wash goes to the washing place,

original: khrus sar rkang rten la legs par brtags nas 'dug ste /
analyzed: khrus sar rkang rten la legs par brtags nas 'dug ste /
translated: he should sit down after examining the foot stand well.

original: shes bzhin du dal bus mnye zhing bkur ba'i gnas khang chus mi dgang ba dang / chus mi gsher bar bya ste /
analyzed: shes bzhin du dal bus mnye zhing bkur ba'i gnas khang chus mi dgang ba dang / chus mi gsher bar bya ste /
translated: He should wash his feet slowly and carefully, without splashing water on the place for washing the feet or the surrounding area.

original: 'di ni bkru ba'i gnas su rkang ba gzhag pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bkru ba'i gnas su rkang ba gzhag pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for placing the feet at the washing place.

original: bkru sa'i khung gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bkru sa'i khung gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the procedure for the washing place?

original: dge slong gis khrus bya bar 'dod na /
analyzed: dge slong gis khrus bya bar 'dod na /
translated: When a monk wishes to wash,

original: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du bkru par bya /
analyzed: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du bkru par bya /
translated: he should wash slowly and carefully, with mindfulness.

original: chos gos kyi mtha' rnams dang bkru sa'i nye 'khor du chus gsher bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: chos gos kyi mtha' rnams dang bkru sa'i nye 'khor du chus gsher bar mi bya ste /
translated: He should not splash water on the edges of the robe or the surrounding area of the washing place.

original: 'di ni bkru sa'i khung gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bkru sa'i khung gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for the washing place.

original: khrus sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: khrus sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the procedure for the elder at the washing place?

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis khrus sar dge slong gsar bu bslang bar mi bya /🔽khrus la zhugs pa las mi bslang ba nas /
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis khrus sar dge slong gsar bu bslang bar mi bya / khrus la zhugs pa las mi bslang ba nas /
translated: The elder monks should not make the younger monks get up from the bathing place.🔽They should not make them get up from bathing.

original: tha na khrus sar zhugs pa las bzlog par yang mi bya ste /
analyzed: tha na khrus sar zhugs pa las bzlog par yang mi bya ste /
translated: They should not even make them get up from the bathing place.

original: 'di ni khrus sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni khrus sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the elder monks’ duty with regard to the bathing place.

original: khrus sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: khrus sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the duty with regard to the vicinity of the bathing place?

original: dge slong khrus sa'i nye 'khor du 'gro ba dang / 'dug par mi bya ba nas /
analyzed: dge slong khrus sa'i nye 'khor du 'gro ba dang / 'dug par mi bya ba nas /
translated: Monks should not go to or stay in the vicinity of the bathing place.

original: snga ma bzhin du khrus sa'i nye 'khor du nges @245b par bya ba rnams ni ma gtogs pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du khrus sa'i nye 'khor du nges @245b par bya ba rnams ni ma gtogs pa'i bar du ste /
translated: As before, they should not do anything in the vicinity of the bathing place except for the things that are allowed.

original: de ni khrus sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni khrus sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty with regard to the vicinity of the bathing place.

original: mchil ma'i bya ba gang zhe na /🔽de na dge slong gis sgra dang bcas pa'i mchil ma dor bar mi bya /
analyzed: mchil ma'i bya ba gang zhe na / de na dge slong gis sgra dang bcas pa'i mchil ma dor bar mi bya /
translated: “What is the duty with regard to spitting?🔽Monks should not spit with noise.

original: lces dril nas sos mnan te mi bya /
analyzed: lces dril nas sos mnan te mi bya /
translated: They should not spit while holding their tongue or while biting their tongue.

original: ston pa'i spyan sngar ma yin /
analyzed: ston pa'i spyan sngar ma yin /
translated: They should not spit in front of the Teacher.

original: mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin /
translated: They should not spit near a stūpa.

original: slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i drung du ma yin /🔽bla ma'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i drung du ma yin / bla ma'i drung du ma yin /
translated: not in the presence of a teacher or preceptor,🔽not in the presence of a guru,

original: bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i drung du ma yin /
translated: not in the presence of someone who is like a guru,

original: zan za bar ma yin /🔽'byung na ma yin /
analyzed: zan za bar ma yin / 'byung na ma yin /
translated: not while eating,🔽not while standing,🔽not while working,

original: yongs su las byed pa'i sar ma yin /🔽dge slong gis bab bab tu mchil ma dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: yongs su las byed pa'i sar ma yin / dge slong gis bab bab tu mchil ma dor ba ma yin /
translated: and not while walking.🔽If a monk spits, he should wipe it up himself,

original: mchil ma bor nas 'phyag par bya ste ;
analyzed: mchil ma bor nas 'phyag par bya ste ;
translated: or have someone else wipe it up,

original: yang na rkang pas mnye'o //
analyzed: yang na rkang pas mnye'o //
translated: or cover it with his foot,

original: yang na sas dgab po //
analyzed: yang na sas dgab po //
translated: or cover it with earth.

original: dge slong gis mchil ma phyi phyir zhing dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis mchil ma phyi phyir zhing dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: A monk should not spit repeatedly.

original: gal te phyi phyir zhing dor na de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te phyi phyir zhing dor na de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: If he spits repeatedly, he should go to another place, so as not to disturb others.

original: de ni mchil ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni mchil ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the proper conduct with regard to spitting.

original: mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba gang zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams mchil ma dor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba gang zhe na / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams mchil ma dor ba'i phyir /
translated: What is the proper conduct with regard to spittoons?

original: mchil ma'i snod rnam pa gnyis rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: mchil ma'i snod rnam pa gnyis rjes su gnang ste /
translated: The Blessed One allowed two types of spittoons for monks to spit in.

original: slob dpon gyis byas pa dang / bdag nyid kyis byas pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis byas pa dang / bdag nyid kyis byas pa'o //
translated: by the master or by oneself.

original: dge slong gis mchil ma'i snod dus dus su brtag par bya ;
analyzed: dge slong gis mchil ma'i snod dus dus su brtag par bya ;
translated: A monk should check the spittoon from time to time.

original: bskam par bya /
analyzed: bskam par bya /
translated: He should dry it out.

original: dben par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: dben par gzhag par bya /
translated: He should keep it in a secluded place.

original: shin tu bkru bar bya /
analyzed: shin tu bkru bar bya /
translated: He should wash it well.

original: ci nas kyang de'i rkyen gyis phyi phyir zhing brel bar mi 'gyur bar bya ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang de'i rkyen gyis phyi phyir zhing brel bar mi 'gyur bar bya ste /
translated: He should do it in such a way that it does not become a cause for further trouble.

original: de ni mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty with regard to the spittoon.

original: so shing gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: so shing gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty with regard to tooth cleaners?

original: dge slong gis so shing ring po bcang bar mi bya /🔽shin tu thung ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dge slong gis so shing ring po bcang bar mi bya / shin tu thung ba'ang ma yin /
translated: A monk should not use a tooth cleaner that is too long.🔽Nor should it be too short.

original: shin tu sbom pa'ang ma yin /🔽shin tu phra ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: shin tu sbom pa'ang ma yin / shin tu phra ba yang ma yin /
translated: Nor should it be too thick.🔽Nor should it be too thin.

original: shin tu ring ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: shin tu ring ba'ang ma yin /
translated: Nor should it be too big.

original: ston pa'i spyan sngar ma yin /
analyzed: ston pa'i spyan sngar ma yin /
translated: Not in front of the Teacher.

original: mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin /🔽slob dpon dang mkhan po'i thad du ma yin /🔽bla ma'i thad du ma yin /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin / slob dpon dang mkhan po'i thad du ma yin / bla ma'i thad du ma yin /
translated: Not in front of a stūpa.🔽Not in front of the master or preceptor.🔽Not in front of a guru.

original: bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i drung du ma yin /
translated: Not in front of one who is like a guru.

original: me khang du ma yin /
analyzed: me khang du ma yin /
translated: Not in the fire hut.

original: bkad sar ma yin /
analyzed: bkad sar ma yin /
translated: not in the open air,

original: 'chag sar ma yin /
analyzed: 'chag sar ma yin /
translated: not while walking,

original: bsro khang du ma yin /
analyzed: bsro khang du ma yin /
translated: not in the sauna,

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin /
translated: not while washing the feet,

original: gnas khang du ma yin /🔽khrus bar rim khang du ma yin /🔽sgo khang du ma yin /
analyzed: gnas khang du ma yin / khrus bar rim khang du ma yin / sgo khang du ma yin /
translated: not in the living quarters,🔽not in the bathroom,🔽not in the courtyard,

original: bshang ba'i sar ma yin /
analyzed: bshang ba'i sar ma yin /
translated: not in the latrine,

original: rtsig pa'i drung du ma yin /🔽shing @246a * //
analyzed: rtsig pa'i drung du ma yin / shing @246a * //
translated: not near a wall,

original: drung du ma yin /
analyzed: drung du ma yin /
translated: not under a tree,

original: gtsug lag khang gi phyag dar bya ba'i khor khor yug tu ma yin /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi phyag dar bya ba'i khor khor yug tu ma yin /
translated: not in the vicinity of the monastery,

original: skye bo mang po 'du ba'i gnas thams cad du so shing dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po 'du ba'i gnas thams cad du so shing dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: and not in any place where people gather.

original: dge slong gis rnam pa gsum dben par bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong gis rnam pa gsum dben par bya ste /
translated: A monk should keep three things private:🔽excrement,

original: bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / so shing bca' ba'o//
analyzed: bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / so shing bca' ba'o//
translated: urine, and tooth cleaning sticks.

original: dge slong so shing 'chos nas de bzhin du ma dor gyi chus bkru bar gyi /
analyzed: dge slong so shing 'chos nas de bzhin du ma dor gyi chus bkru bar gyi /
translated: When a monk has finished cleaning his teeth, he should not throw the stick away until he has washed it with water.

original: yang na rngo bas mnye bar bya /
analyzed: yang na rngo bas mnye bar bya /
translated: He should either burn it or bury it.

original: yang na sa la drud par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na sa la drud par bya ste /
translated: Or he should drag it with his foot to a place where there is no vegetation.

original: 'di ni so shing gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni so shing gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the procedure for tooth cleaning sticks.

original: so brud pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: so brud pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for cleaning the teeth?

original: dge slong gis so shing rnon pos brud par mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis so shing rnon pos brud par mi bya /
translated: A monk should not use a sharp toothpick.

original: bag med par nang du gzhug par mi bya /
analyzed: bag med par nang du gzhug par mi bya /
translated: He should not insert it carelessly.

original: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du brud par bya /
analyzed: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du brud par bya /
translated: He should use it slowly, gradually, and mindfully.

original: so'i rnyil la brud par mi bya ste /
analyzed: so'i rnyil la brud par mi bya ste /
translated: He should not use it to scrape his gums.

original: 'di ni so shing gis brud pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni so shing gis brud pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the proper conduct for using a toothpick.

original: lce bzhar ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: lce bzhar ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the proper conduct for using a tongue scraper?

original: lce bzhar ba rnon pos bzhar bar mi bya /
analyzed: lce bzhar ba rnon pos bzhar bar mi bya /
translated: A monk should not use a sharp tongue scraper.

original: bag med par gzhug par mi bya /
analyzed: bag med par gzhug par mi bya /
translated: He should not insert it carelessly.

original: bags kyis dal bus shes bzhin du lce bzhar bar bya /
analyzed: bags kyis dal bus shes bzhin du lce bzhar bar bya /
translated: He should use it slowly, gradually, and mindfully.

original: lce'i sha bzhar bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: lce'i sha bzhar bar mi bya ste /
translated: He should not use it to scrape the flesh of his tongue.

original: 'di ni lce bzhar ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce bzhar ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the proper conduct for using a tongue scraper.

original: rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the proper conduct for removing earwax?

original: dge slong gis rtse mo rnon pos rna spabs bru bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis rtse mo rnon pos rna spabs bru bar mi bya /
translated: A monk should not use a sharp instrument to remove earwax.

original: bag med par gzhug par mi bya /
analyzed: bag med par gzhug par mi bya /
translated: He should not insert it carelessly.

original: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du rna spabs bru bar bya /
analyzed: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du rna spabs bru bar bya /
translated: He should use it slowly, gradually, and mindfully.

original: rna ba'i sha brud par mi bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i sha brud par mi bya ste /
translated: He should not use it to scrape the flesh of his ears.

original: 'di ni rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure of earwax.

original: kun du spyod pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: kun du spyod pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure of practice?

original: dge slong gis yon tan thams cad gsungs par spyad pa ni spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis yon tan thams cad gsungs par spyad pa ni spyod pa'o //
translated: The practice of a monk who practices all the virtues is practice.

original: kun du mi spyod pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: kun du mi spyod pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure of non-practice?

original: de ltar slar bzlog pa ni mi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar slar bzlog pa ni mi spyod pa'o //
translated: The turning away from that is non-practice.

original: ma ma'i phung po gsum rdzogs re ma mo rdzogs so /
analyzed: ma ma'i phung po gsum rdzogs re ma mo rdzogs so /
translated: The three aggregates of the mother are complete. The mother is complete.

original: // / btsun pa 'dul ba'i lus gang lags /
analyzed: // / btsun pa 'dul ba'i lus gang lags /
translated: Venerable, what is the body of the Vinaya?

original: dmigs pa gang lags /
analyzed: dmigs pa gang lags /
translated: What is the object?

original: byin gyis brlabs pa gang lags /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa gang lags /
translated: What is the consecration?

original: mtshan nyid gang lags /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang lags /
translated: What is the characteristic?

original: gleng gzhi gang lags /
analyzed: gleng gzhi gang lags /
translated: What is the nidāna?

original: ngo bo nyid gang lags /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gang lags /
translated: What is the essence?

original: 'bras bu gang lags /
analyzed: 'bras bu gang lags /
translated: What is the result?

original: nye ba 'khor 'dul ba'i lus ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor 'dul ba'i lus ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: Upāli, the body of the Vinaya is the object.

original: dmigs pa ni nan tan no //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni nan tan no //
translated: The object is practice.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ni lus ldang / ngag dang / yid do //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ni lus ldang / ngag dang / yid do //
translated: The consecration is the body, speech, and mind.

original: mtshan nyid ni las so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni las so //
translated: The characteristic is action.

original: gleng gzhi ni bsgrags pa'o //
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni bsgrags pa'o //
translated: The nidāna is the proclamation.

original: ngo bo nyid ni nyes pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni nyes pa'o //
translated: The essence is the fault.

original: 'bras bu ni mtho ris dang thar pa'o /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni mtho ris dang thar pa'o /
translated: The result is the higher realms and liberation.
